title: Grateful Dead Live at Delta Center on 1995-02-21
lineage: Fostex D5 DAT (playback of DAT Master record) @ 16-bits, 48 kHz (S/PDIF optical out) > M-Audio Firewire Audiophile external soundcard > Magix Sound Forge Pro Suite 12.1 build 170 x64  Audacity used for tracking, tagging, flac8 conversion
source: AKGC60B+CK8x shotgun in OTS, ~34’ to St.L of C (inline w/hanging PA; aimed at the PA) > Panasonic SV-255 (Paul Tumolo’s rig) Analog or Digi out, possibly via custom patchbay built by Neil Sturtevant (detail not noted) > Sony TCD-D3 DAT @ 48 kHz
